title: HostColor
author: HostColor
content: We are HostColor.com a well-established and reputable IT Hosting provider since 2000. Thank you for taking some of your time to review our US Dedicated Servers and 10Gbps Dedicated Server offerings.Bare-Metal Dedicated Servers - From 250 Mbps to 10 Gbps Bandwidthhttps://www.hostcolor.com/dedicatedhosting/bare-metal-servers.html- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -- 1 x Intel Xeon D-1531 processor Intel Xeon E5-2680v4- 6 Cores @ 2.6 GHz- 16 GB RAM- 480 GB enterprise SSD (Upgrade to 2x 480 GB SSD)- IPMI 2.0 (KVM over IP)- 1 Gbps Internet Connection- 250 Mbps Bandwidth (Upgrade to 1000 Mbps)- Choose between Ashburn, Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Los Angeles, Miami, New York, Toronto, Seattle and other US & North American data center locations- Instant Setup- Free Traffic/Port Monitoring- Remote Power Reboot Outlet- 1 usable IPv4 address (Additional IPs available)- /64 IPv6 subnet- Upgrades & customizations available- Monthly Contract (No forced annual contracts)- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -Price: â‚¿0.0029/month (the BTC price is equivalent to $79/mo, applies to a 12-month contract) - 6 Cores, 250 Mbps Dedicated Server - Sign UpAdd-Ons- 1000 Mbps Bandwidth: $100/mo- Upgrade to 960 GB SSD: 10/mo- IP addresses: $2/mo=- /24 IPv4 subnet: $256/month- Fully Managed Server: $99/monthImportant: Please note that if you need a server for mass mailing (sending unsolicited Bulk mail), HostColor.com is not a good choice for you!Why Choose HostColor?- Redundant network, 100% Uptime SLA guarantee- Choose between 50 data center locations worldwide- Resource-rich, server systems- 24/7 Support- responsive, friendly and knowledgeable- Fair pricing, risk-free and quality Dedicated hosting service- Significant experience. We host and managed servers since 2000HostColor.com is a trusted web hosting provider since 2000. If you need custom build server configuration, please call 1-574-367-2393 or go to accounts.hostcolor.com/submitticket.php and contact our Sales team! We will work with you to create a custom quote at the best possible price. Please tell us how can we help you!
